contented.title: About us
contented.text: WorkQuest is a social project based on blockchain technology aimed at facilitating job search and solving all the tasks of employers in quest mode. Are you looking for a job ? WorkQuest will help you find a quest next to your home or in your city. Do you need workers to achieve certain goals ? Just create a quest on the WorkQuest site. The service assumes warranty obligations for the execution of quests. Employer funds are kept with us. If the employee provides confirmation of the performance of the work, the funds are returned to his account. The system of ratings, ratings and the list of completed quests will help to easily find honest people and reliable specialists.Our goal is to simplify the communication between employers and employees, help millions of people find jobs, improve their financial situation, solve the constant problem of finding reliable professionals in all sectors to create a progressive digital economy based on the principles of trust, mutual respect and well-being of all its participants.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.invite: Invites you to complete the offer

pension.title: Retirement program
pension.desc: You can select a percentage of each completed offer that will subsequently be automatically credited to your pension account, or you can simply enter the amount you prefer. Group funds are invested on behalf of the employee, and gains on investments generate income for the worker upon retirement.

referral.title: Program of recommendations
referral.desc: Refer and Earn is a program that allows you to earn rewards for each friend you refer, become a customer, and subsequently complete an offer. Friends you've recommended also save by getting a free registration.

p2p.title: P2P Insurance
p2p.desc: P2P (peer-to-peer) insurance is a product that allows a group of policyholders to pool their capital, organize themselves automatically and manage their own insurance. The main idea of P2P is that a group of people with similar ideas and mutual interests group their insurance policies together to create a sense of control, trust and transparency, while reducing costs. This insurance model combines traditional pooling and loss sharing with current innovations and technologies, providing a product for increasingly expert consumers who need transparency in an on-demand economy.

savings.title: Savings product
savings.desc: A cryptocurrency savings account gives you access to the cryptocurrency market, while earning interest, just like a traditional bank savings account. If you're interested in investing in cryptocurrencies for the long term, a cryptocurrency savings account can help you earn interest while keeping your money safe.

crediting.title: Loan
crediting.desc: Similar to a traditional loan, the amount of the cryptocurrency loan is credited to the borrower's bank account and subsequently the borrower pays a monthly fee to the lender. After paying off the debt, the lender releases the collateral that served as collateral.

mining.title: Liquidity mining
mining.desc: is a decentralized finance mechanism (DeFi) in which participants add cryptocurrencies to liquidity funds and receive remuneration with commissions and tokens based on their share of the fund's total liquidity.

pension.howToTakePart: How to participate in the pension program?
pension.pensionPlanText: A pension plan may allow a worker to contribute a portion of his or her current wage income to an investment plan to help fund his or her retirement.
pension.timeRemainsUntilTheEndOfThePeriod: Time remaining until the end of the period:

faq1.question: What are the requirements to apply for a pension?
faq1.answer: You do not need to have worked for an employer for a specific number of years to be eligible for retirement benefits. Simply select the percentage of each offer you want to accumulate in your account. Your retirement benefit will increase as you accumulate funds. The additional percentage will be automatically increased by using funds in the loan program.

faq2.question: How is the additional percentage calculated?
faq2.answer: Pension funds shall be blocked in the credit agreement. The annual percentage yield varies according to changes in the credit protocol. Profit can vary by 3-6 %

faq3.question: How do pension plans work?
faq3.answer: You do not need to have worked for an employer for a specific number of years to be eligible for retirement benefits. Simply select the percentage of each offer you want to accumulate in your account. Your retirement benefit will increase as you accumulate funds. The additional percentage will be automatically increased by using funds in the loan program.

faq4.question: How many years do you need to work to be able to collect the pension plan?
faq4.answer:
Under the WorkQuest rules, anyone can open a private sector savings plan. After the first three years, you will be able to receive 100 % of the accumulated funds.
You can keep accumulating funds for another year, or you can withdraw all funds to your portfolio.

faq5.question: What is a good pension?
faq5.answer: What amount is recommended for a good pension? Some counselors recommend saving 10 times the average wage during your working life at the time of retirement. So, if your average salary is $ 30,000, your pension savings goal should be about $300,000. Another good tip is that you should save 12.5% of your monthly salary.

faq6.question: Is the monthly pension taxable?
faq6.answer: The payment of the monthly pension is almost always considered a taxable income, and you will need to ensure that you have an adequate withholding tax on pension payments to meet the requirements of the tax administration

faq7.question: Can I withdraw all my pension in one operation?
faq7.answer: After the minimum 3-year period of the retirement program, you can withdraw some or all of your pension savings in a single operation.

faq8.question: Can I cancel my pension and get the money?
faq8.answer: If you withdraw after the minimum of 3 years or on the day of the annual renewal, you will receive all the money you have already paid. If you decide to cancel later, you will not be able to receive a refund of your payments until the end of the extended period (usually 1 year).

faq9.question: Can I collect my pension and continue working?
faq9.answer: Can I get my pension early and continue working? The short answer is yes. Currently, no retirement age has been defined. You can continue to work for as long as you prefer, while also accessing the pension scheme.

faq10.question: What happens if I add too many funds to my pension?
faq10.answer: We have no restrictions on the amount of savings. You will be able to have all the accumulated amount at the end of the program period.

saving.withdrawModalBody: The amount of blocked funds and accrued interest will be paid into your portfolio
saving.templateText:
Are you committed to maintaining your cryptocurrencies?
 A simple way to lend and earn with fixed-term savings.
saving.faq1: What are term savings? Are you committed to maintaining your cryptocurrencies?
saving.faq2: What will happen to my funds if I subscribe to a term savings product?
saving.faq3: What will happen to my funds on the value date of a term savings product?
saving.faq4: What will happen to my funds on the amortization date of the term savings product?
saving.faq5: How is the average annual return calculated?
saving.faq6: What guarantees do I have that I will earn interest on WorkQuest Savings products, even if cryptocurrency markets go down?
saving.ans1: Now you can earn interest at the same time! Subscribe your cryptocurrencies to fixed-term savings periods for better-interest earnings.
saving.ans2: On the day of the subscription, WorkQuest Savings will deduct the subscription funds from your WUSD portfolio.
saving.ans3: On the value date, WorkQuest Savings will distribute the fixed-term savings products in its savings portfolio, and your savings product will begin to accrue interest.
saving.ans4: On the payback date, you will see both the initial tokens allocated to the subscription and the accumulated interest from balances  of your WorkQuest account. This process will be automatic.
saving.ans5: The average annual return uses the average daily interest rate of the previous 7 days, multiplied by 365.
saving.ans6: Yes. The interest rate on each product is guaranteed.
saving.depositModalBody: Your cryptocurrencies will be blocked for a specific period, and you will start earning interest.

faq1.question: What does P2P mean in insurance?
faq1.answer: P2P (peer-to-peer) insurance is a product that allows a group of policyholders to pool their capital, organize themselves automatically and manage their own insurance

faq2.question: How do P2P insurance work?
faq2.answer: Peer-to-peer (or P2P) insurance allows groups of people to provide insurance coverage to each other. Group fund members pool their money to insure the event of a risk affecting them. If a panel member suffers a covered loss, his or her claim will be paid directly from each member's contributed money fund.

faq3.question: How does peer-to-peer insurance work?
faq3.answer: Request a peer review. In a peer review, your guarantee fund will discuss with other fund members the purpose of the service or therapies that may be medically necessary. You can upload to the chat all the documents and medical assessments necessary to prove the legality of your case, and then create a vote so that foundation members can make a decision. If the majority of the fund votes in favor, you will receive the payment in your wallet.

faq4.question: What happens to the fund if the covered event does not occur within one year?
faq4.answer: At the end of the year, all users will receive notifications with a vote asking them to vote to expand the fund for another year, which will automatically double the fund and payments in the event of a covered event, or if the fund is divided among participants.

faq5.question: Who is the administrator of the fund?
faq5.answer: To ensure that all participants in the fund do not waste time considering all events covered, the administrator may delegate their voting rights to the fund manager in exchange for a small commission

faq6.question: What is the standard size of a guarantee fund?
faq6.answer: The funds are made up of 10 users, according to the level of protection selected

faq7.question: How is the amount of the guarantee fund payment calculated?
faq7.answer:
This is an example for calculating the first year fund: minimum protection - an annual premium of 1000 WUSD; payment in the case of a covered event of 833.333333 WUSD.
10 fund members * 1000 USD / 12 months + 833.333333 WUSD.
In the event that the fund is continued for another year, the size of the fund and the insurance indemnity will be doubled.

faq8.question: What is the security guarantee of withdrawals by a fund member?
faq8.answer: All members of the fund shall hold the funds in a multi-firm portfolio, where all decisions are reached only by a majority vote.
